Text: For sure,all the games in this series are great.Thanks for this,I only had afrika and CMBB
Awesome, been looking for this for AGES.

Provided CD Crack did not work.

However, a working one is available from here:
http://gf.wiretarget.com/combat_mission.htm

Choose the "Special Edition" NoCD Patch.
Provided crack works fine if you get the 1.12 patch.
Thanks for posting this, love these games. Oh and btw, the CD crack ZZT-X provided below works.
